summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in block 51, Replat of blocks 44 to 53, inclusive, Mercer's 2nd Addition being the alley between Taylor Avenue and 6th Avenue North from Valley Street to Aloha Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 108897 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
